Sentencas: Ca-doped La2NiO4+delta is synthesized via the nitrate-citrate route.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The effects of Ca substitution for La on the sinterability, lattice structure and electrical properties of La2NiO4+delta are investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Ca-doping is unfavorable for the densification process of La2-xCaxNiO4+delta materials.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The introduction of Ca leads to the elongation of the La-O(2) bond length, which provides more space for the migration of oxygen ion in La2O2 rock salt layers.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The substitution of Ca increases remarkably the electronic conductivity of La2-xCaxNiO4+delta.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: With increasing Ca-doping level, both the excess oxygen concentration and the activation energy of oxygen ion migration decrease, resulting in an optimization where a highest ionic conductivity is presented.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Ca-doping is charge compensated by the oxidation of Ni2+ to Ni3+ and the desorption of excess oxygen.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The substitution of Ca enhances the structural stability of La2NiO4+delta material at high temperatures and renders the material a good thermal cycleability.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: La1.7Ca0.3NiO4+delta exhibits an excellent chemical compatibility with CGO electrolyte.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: La2-xCaxNiO4+delta is a promising cathode alternative for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation and electrical properties of Ca-doped La2NiO4+δ cathode materials for IT-SOFC
